18 // helper template for circle shapes
19 
20 template<class Object = i2d::CCircle, class Shape = iview::CCircleShape>
21 struct TCircleVisualObject
22 {
23  TCircleVisualObject(bool editable = false);
24 
25  typedef imod::TModelWrap<Object> PositionModel;
26 
27  istd::TDelPtr<PositionModel> model;
28  istd::TDelPtr<Shape> shape;
29 };
30 
31 
32 template<class Object, class Shape>
33 TCircleVisualObject<Object, Shape>::TCircleVisualObject(bool editable)
34 {
35  model.SetPtr(new PositionModel);
36 
37  shape.SetPtr(new Shape);
38  shape->SetEditablePosition(editable);
39  shape->SetEditableRadius(editable);
40 
41  model->AttachObserver(shape.GetPtr());
42 }
43 
44 
45 // helper template for image shapes
46 
47 template<class Object, class BitmapShape = iview::CImageShape>
48 struct TBitmapVisualObject
49 {
50  TBitmapVisualObject(const Object* imagePtr = NULL);
51 
52  typedef imod::TModelWrap<Object> ImageModel;
53 
54  istd::TDelPtr<ImageModel> model;
55  istd::TDelPtr<BitmapShape> shape;
56 };
57 
58 
59 template<class Object, class BitmapShape>
60 TBitmapVisualObject<Object, BitmapShape>::TBitmapVisualObject(const Object* imagePtr)
61 {
62  model.SetPtr(new ImageModel);
63  if (imagePtr != NULL){
64  model->SetBaseObject(*imagePtr);
65  }
66 
67  shape.SetPtr(new BitmapShape);
68 
69  model->AttachObserver(shape.GetPtr());
70 }
